author: bentwnghk
prompt: Generate at random a 15-item vocabulary list from Oxford 3000, beginning with different letters, in the format "**English word** \[繁體中文定義] <word class symbol>: example sentence 例句中文翻譯".

description.zh_Hans: 专注于从牛津3000词表中随机生成15个以不同字母开头的词汇，并提供详细释义、词性和例句。
description.zh_Hant: 專注於從牛津3000詞表中隨機生成15個以不同字母開頭的詞彙，並提供詳細釋義、詞性和例句。
description.en: Expert in randomly generating 15 vocabulary items from the Oxford 3000, each starting with a different letter, along with definitions, word classes, and example sentences.
